content:
JP - thanks for the reply and the clarification of my post.

Thanks, Anthony
post_title: Automating the Generation of iOS Push Notification Certificates
author: Anthony

content: Anthony, in a sense, yes. Technically, it runs the browser and simulates user input. It then scripts the local Mac OS X Keychain application to generate the keys and certificates. Apple doesn't provide any API to do this.
post_title: Automating the Generation of iOS Push Notification Certificates
author: JP

content: This is interesting - so if I read this correctly this code is basically simulating a web browser to handle the certificate creation. I take it Apple hasn't done anything in terms of providing a callable API to achieve these same results?
post_title: Automating the Generation of iOS Push Notification Certificates
author: Anthony
